title: What really happened to Ferdinand Marcos' Martial Law? - Quora

response.answer_text: He cheated on the elections, Ninoy was assassinated, and the people rebelled - the army siding with the people, and Marcos was airlifted to Hawaii by the Americans. It was an inglorious end to kleptocracy. This was February 1986 - the “EDSA Day”.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Jerica Mae Alonzo
